statements: SELECT * FROM MalwareMetadata;
SELECT malware_name, malware_type FROM MalwareMetadata;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name, classification_level FROM MalwareMetadata WHERE classification_level = 1;
SELECT malware_name, malware_description FROM MalwareMetadata WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM MalwareMetadata ORDER BY malware_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareMetadata WHERE classification_level > 3;
SELECT malware_name, malware_type FROM MalwareMetadata WHERE malware_name LIKE 'W%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MalwareMetadata;
SELECT malware_name, malware_description FROM MalwareMetadata WHERE malware_type = 'Trojan' ORDER BY malware_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareMetadata WHERE malware_type IS NOT NULL AND classification_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY classification_level DESC, malware_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Malware_Metadata;
SELECT malware_name, malware_type FROM Malware_Metadata WHERE malware_id = 5;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name, malware_type, detection_score FROM Malware_Metadata ORDER BY malware_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Malware_Properties WHERE malware_id = 3;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM Malware_Properties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Malware_Metadata WHERE malware_type = 'ransomware';
SELECT malware_name, detection_score FROM Malware_Metadata ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT m.malware_name, p.property_name FROM Malware_Metadata m JOIN Malware_Properties p ON m.malware_id = p.malware_id WHERE p.property_name LIKE '%encryption%';
SELECT malware_id, AVG(detection_score) AS avg_score FROM Malware_Metadata GROUP BY malware_id HAVING AVG(detection_score) > 8;
SELECT m.malware_id, p.property_name, p.property_value FROM Malware_Metadata m LEFT JOIN Malware_Properties p ON m.malware_id = p.malware_id WHERE p.property_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM malware_metadata;
SELECT malware_name, file_size FROM malware_metadata WHERE classification = 'Trojan';
SELECT malware_name, file_type FROM malware_metadata ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT malware_id, property_name, property_value FROM malware_properties WHERE malware_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT tag FROM malware_tags WHERE malware_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM malware_metadata;
SELECT malware_name, file_size FROM malware_metadata WHERE classification = 'Trojan';
SELECT malware_id, property_name, property_value FROM malware_properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%encryption%';
SELECT m.malware_name, t.tag FROM malware_metadata m JOIN malware_tags t ON m.malware_id = t.malware_id;
SELECT malware_name, file_size, classification FROM malware_metadata ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_metadata;
SELECT name, description FROM malware_metadata WHERE classification='Trojan';
SELECT malware_id, name, detection_engine FROM malware_metadata WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tag_name FROM malware_tags WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT label_name AS label, description AS details FROM classification_labels;
SELECT * FROM malware_metadata;
SELECT name, classification FROM malware_metadata WHERE classification = 'Trojan';
SELECT m.name, p.property_name, p.property_value FROM malware_metadata m JOIN malware_properties p ON m.malware_id = p.malware_id;
SELECT m.name, t.tag_name FROM malware_metadata m JOIN malware_tags t ON m.malware_id = t.malware_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'ransomware';
SELECT m.name, c.label_name FROM malware_metadata m JOIN classification_labels c ON m.classification = c.label_name;
SELECT * FROM Malware_Metadata;
SELECT name, description FROM Malware_Metadata WHERE classification='Trojan';
SELECT property_name, data_type FROM Properties ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT classification_name, description FROM Classification WHERE classification_id=2;
SELECT * FROM Detection_Method WHERE method_name LIKE '%signature%';
SELECT * FROM Malware_Metadata;
SELECT name, classification FROM Malware_Metadata WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM Malware_Metadata WHERE classification = 'Trojan';
SELECT property_name, data_type FROM Properties;
SELECT family_name, description FROM Family ORDER BY family_name DESC;
